security: Revealing personnel assignments could potentially expose operational details or create security risks by identifying individuals involved in sensitive activities.
summary: This document contains personnel action requests for Floryan R. Karty, indicating reassignments within the CIA, specifically involving transfers between Mexico City and Bangkok.
summary_one_paragraph: This file pertains to Floryan R. Karty and includes personnel actions dated July 1951 to September 1972. It features two 'Request for Personnel Action' forms, one documenting a reassignment for Karty within the DDP/WH branch to the Mexico, Mexico Station, and another indicating a reassignment from DDP/PE/2120/Bangkok Station/Operations Branch, both as an OPS Officer. These forms detail organizational designations, position titles, salary grades, and relevant remarks concerning the personnel changes and distribution of copies.
title: Karty, Floryan R.
sender: DDP/WH/OO/MEXICO STATION and DDP/PE/2120/BANGKOK STATION/OPERATIONS BRANCH
